message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000.  This is a fair price given the value it holds for both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I think it's a bit high. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I appreciate your offer, I'm not able to go below $1,600,000 at this time. I'm confident this product will provide significant value to your business.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,450,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.
